full_summary:
## HVAC Maintenance and Building Patrol Services in Iqaluit, Nunavut

### Tender Details

* Tender Number: #1000256252
* Solicitation Number: #cb-221-49230686
* Tender Closing Date: Friday, May 3, 2024 at 2:00 PM (14:00)
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 3, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

### Tender Specifications

* The Department of Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) is seeking a qualified Inuit firm to provide Heating, Ventilation, Air Conditioning (HVAC) maintenance and building patrol services in Iqaluit, Nunavut.
* Services shall include:
	+ HVAC maintenance and repair
	+ Building patrols for safety and security purposes
* The proposed contract duration shall be from the contract award date to March 31, 2025.
* An irrevocable option to extend the contract term by up to three (3) additional one-year periods under the same conditions shall be included in the resulting contract.

### Tender Requirements

* Inuit firms on the Inuit firm registry are invited to bid.
* Bidders must demonstrate compliance with relevant regulatory requirements, including environmental and asbestos management regulations.

### Contact Information

* For more information, please contact Elly Ha at ellyhyeonkyeong.ha@sac-isc.gc.ca or (000) 000-0000.

### Document Attachments

* A detailed tender package can be accessed through the Canadian Buy and Sell website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36350/1000256252_npp_apm_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36350/1000256252_npp_apm_1.pdf) İngleyinurdlanmıştır
